short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The best way to receive alerts about your favorite foods at Brown University

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A chrome extension to show the best foods available at all the best dining halls at Brown University: the Ratty, Andrews, the V-Dub, the Blue Room, the Ivy Room, and Josiah's! Enter your favorite foods once and then refresh the extension every time you want to see what's available that day.

FOR FEEDBACK: Please contact john_randolph {at} alumni.brown.edu or see contact info at johngrandolph.com
